WorkItem.Description:
Test (plain read/write):
----
$reader = new PHPExcel_Reader_Excel2007();
$excel = $reader->load('read.xlsx');
 
$writer = new PHPExcel_Writer_Excel2007($excel);
$writer->save('write.xlsx');
 
Expected result
----
Frozen panes are still present in output
 
Actual result
----
Frozen panes are lost
 
Environment
----
PHPExcel: Latest source from SVN (1.6.4+)
WorkItem.Summary: Freeze panes not read by PHPExcel_Reader_Excel2007
